entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
